page.title: 07ECOLOGY
page.content: The land in the area is mainly used for housing and farming. The people in the area are not very wealthy but not very poor. There are no industrial factories so the people are mostly commuters because there is a railway station in Meopham. In the area there are many groups such as Scouts, Cubs, Beavers and Theatrical Groups. There are a couple of groups of shops in the area but they are not big stores. Meopham School has three playing fields. There are a number of Schools and petrol stations and there is one park called Camer Park. The weather is not bad, but we get a fair amount of rain before the summer. There is also a Footpaths Group who walk regularly and are well organised and lay walks for the public.
